Description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: Private Renting Demand.
Name: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18: Private Renting Demand
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as an Excel file entitled Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18 Section 4 Tables - Private Renting Demand under heading Documents.
Sizing Notes: simple tables.  Needs a little up front work to define dimension handling
